name: Pocket ID
author: Pocket ID Team
description: Pocket ID is a simple and easy-to-use OIDC provider that allows users to authenticate with their passkeys to your services. It supports only passkey authentication, eliminating the need for passwords and providing a modern, secure authentication solution for self-hosted applications.

form_fields.label: Application URL
form_fields.hint: The full URL where Pocket ID will be accessible (leave empty for auto-detection)

form_fields.label: Trust Proxy
form_fields.hint: Enable if running behind a reverse proxy (Traefik, Nginx, etc.)

form_fields.label: Database Password
form_fields.hint: Automatically generated secure password for the PostgreSQL database

form_fields.label: MaxMind License Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: MaxMind GeoLite2 license key for geographical IP analysis
